expertInsights.name: Expert Insights
expertInsights.description: Benefit from years of trading experience from our team of analysts.

regularUpdates.name: Regular Updates
regularUpdates.description: Receive analysis on your schedule – daily, weekly, or bi-weekly.

priceAlerts.name: Price Alerts
priceAlerts.description: Get notified when your assets reach critical price levels.

customDelivery.name: Custom Delivery
customDelivery.description: Receive analysis directly in your inbox when you need it most.

advancedCharts.name: Advanced Charts
advancedCharts.description: Visual representation of trends with clear entry and exit points.

flexiblePlans.name: Flexible Plans
flexiblePlans.description: Choose the subscription plan that matches your trading needs.

newsletter.title: Get market insights first
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest market analysis, trading tips, and exclusive offers.
newsletter.consentText: I agree to receive marketing emails and can unsubscribe anytime

company.description: Expert market analysis delivered to your inbox. Subscribe to make informed trading decisions.

enhancedFooter.copyright: Novia AI Inc. All rights reserved.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Empowering traders with AI-driven market analysis and expert insights for informed decision-making in global financial markets.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded by a team of experienced traders and AI specialists, Novia AI was born from the need to democratize access to professional-grade market analysis.
story.paragraph2: We recognized that successful trading requires more than just intuition – it demands data-driven insights, technical expertise, and timely market intelligence.
story.paragraph3: Today, we serve thousands of traders worldwide, providing them with the tools and knowledge they need to navigate complex financial markets with confidence.

emailTypes.title: Types of Analysis We Provide
emailTypes.subtitle: Our comprehensive analysis covers multiple formats to suit different trading styles and preferences.

signal.title: Trading Signals
signal.description: Precise entry and exit points with clear stop-loss and take-profit levels for immediate action.

analysis.title: Market Analysis
analysis.description: Detailed technical analysis with support and resistance levels, trend direction, and market outlook.

target.title: Target Achievement
target.description: Real-time notifications when your trades reach predetermined profit targets.

newSession.title: Session Updates
newSession.description: Alerts for new trading sessions and market opening opportunities.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our mission to provide exceptional trading insights and services.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: We strive for precision in every analysis, using advanced algorithms and expert validation.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear, honest communication about market conditions, risks, and potential outcomes.

education.title: Education
education.description: Empowering traders with knowledge and insights to improve their trading skills.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously improving our AI models and analysis techniques for better results.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Maintaining the highest ethical standards in all our trading recommendations.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Putting our subscribers' success at the center of everything we do.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Trading?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of successful traders who trust Novia AI for their market analysis needs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions about our services? Need support with your subscription? We're here to help you succeed in your trading journey.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

info.description: Reach out to us through any of these channels.
